name: Breaking Frenzy!
description:
Backspace to go the menu from credits

Welcome! This is a game made in 48 hours!

This is a game made for the Pallete Jam, using 8 colors.

Theme : Break

A ball is out of control! It keeps breaking everything it touches! Guide it through the level and break as many things as possible! I hope you enjoy it!

The game quite obviously fits the theme because the ball has the break the ground.
